summary: Adds a craftable Daedric Weapon with Elemental Fury effect.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][color=red]Always read descriptions and please endorse any mod you found useful![/color][/b][/size]

[color=yellow][size=4]Adds a craftable Daedric Weapon with Elemental Fury effect (Shout word power 1).[/size][/color]

[color=lime]Author:[/color]
    Squall (on Nexus Squall82)

[color=lime]Warning:[/color]
    *Always, before you add a new mod, save your game and make a backup of save!
    *I haven't got any, but there might be a glitch when using shout "Elemental Fury"with the weapons together.

[color=lime]Bugs:[/color]
    Please report if any!

[color=lime]Incompatibilities:[/color]
    *Please report if any!

[color=lime]Information:[/color]
    *Adds a craftable Daedric Weapon with Elemental Fury effect (Shout word power 1).
    *To this to work, you must spend one perk point to increase weapon speed for each hand (trying to find how to fix this).
    *You can learn enchantment effect and enchant other weapons.

[color=lime]Install:[/color]
    1.Extract "data" folder to your game DIR. Where "TESV.exe" is.
    2.Enable "Enchantment - Elemental Fury" through mod manager you use or launcher->data files.

[color=lime]Uninstall:[/color]
    1.Remove any item related to this mod from your inventory.
    2.Delete "Enchantment - Elemental Fury" from you game DIR "data" folder.

[color=lime]Changes:[/color]
    v1.1
        Fixed effect for bows.
    v1.05
        Added enchantment charge (yet if you run out of charges, elemental fury won't disappear).
    v1.04
        Added value for enchantment so you actually get some points for enchanting/disenchanting.
    v1.03
        Replaced Hawk Feather instead of Void Salts in recipe.
    v1.02
        Changed effect to shout word 1 power (1.3 speed mult).
    v1.01
        Fixed wrong enchantment type error report.
    v1.0
        Added Elemental Fury Enchantment for swords.

[color=lime]Credits:[/color]
    Bethesda Softworks

[color=lime]Permission:[/color]
    Just give me credits and do whatever you want..
author: Squall
